mention.text: RIA Novosti that Russia could deploy short-range Iskander missiles in the country 's western most Kaliningrad region if NATO decides to strengthen its military presence in Eastern Europe
RIA Novosti that US domestic issues contribute to such moves
US Air Force General Philip Breedlove
Eastern Europe following the increased tensions over Ukraine
a political science professor at Emory University
the escalation of tensions in Ukraine
the escalation of tensions in Ukraine
Russia for the escalation of tensions in Ukraine

arms and troops on the country 's border
arms and troops on the country 's border
the country 's western most Kaliningrad region
Buzhinsky , who previously headed the department of international agreements in the Russian Defense Ministry
